page.title: 02 PEOPLE IN AYNHO
page.content: We did a survey of people in Aynho. 50% of houses replied. 40% had {LIVED IN AYNHO} for more than 20 yrs;27% for 10-20yrs and 33% for less than 10 yrs. Of those who had {MOVED INTO AYNHO}, 22% had lived in Northants;27% in Oxon, 13% in Bucks or Warks;22% in the South- East;11% in the North and 5% elsewhere. The {AGE OF PEOPLE} who live in Aynho is old. 19% are under 18yrs;only 10% are aged 19-30yrs;32% are aged 31- 60yrs and 39% are over 60yrs. All the people we asked liked living in Aynho. It is a {POPULAR VILLAGE} and so houses have become very expensive. Young couples cannot afford to buy a house here and so there aren't many children. This is why the school is having to close this year.
